'''''Amon Hen'' 244''' is the two-hundred-and-forty-forth issue of the [[The Tolkien Society]]'s bimonthly journal ''[[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen]]'', published in November [[2013]].

==Contents==
* Cover: ''Radagast''
** By: [[Jef Murray]]

** By: [[Andrew Butler]]

** By: Lynn Forest-Hill

** By: Ian Collier

** By: Juan Manuel Grijalvo
* Report: Oxonmoot 2013
** By: Maggie Bailey

** By: Jessica Yates

** By: [[Alex Lewis]]

** By: Ian Collier
